Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    The nodeclass simulates a node in the environment grid. It can contain Create events and contain information about events. Each node is created with a position

      • sendAgent

        private Agent sendAgent(int id,
              Node n,
              int time)
        This method sends an agent. There is a chance each time an event is created.
        Parameters:
        id - The events id
        n - The node that sent the event
        time - The events timestep
        Returns:
        the agent to be sent
